channel.title: Very noobie question! (but still need the answer!)
channel.description:
i know about includes and all but, when i look through like the mining includes and i see procedures by different people, how do i actually add that into my script to make it do it, (if you see what im saying)
also how does it all work?
all help would be great thanks =)

item.title: Very noobie question! (but still need the answer!)
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

ok well this section of the forum is for scar scripting help!

This forum doesnt have much time for leechers, so i think its in your best interest to learn scripting!

however, if your looking for some good free script, try free script section on villu-reborn.com

Read full topic

item.title: Very noobie question! (but still need the answer!)
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Say if you found a procedure called DropAllThings; that dropped everything in inventory you would do something like this:

[php]
If(InvenFull) Then
DropAllThings; <— Just put the name of the procedure where you want to call it :)[/php]

Read full topic
